syncData.content:
{"settings":"{
  "editor.lineHeight": 20,
  "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 14,
  "editor.fontFamily": "CommitMonoChunporo Nerd Font",
  "editor.fontLigatures": true,

  "editor.suggestSelection": "first",
  "vsintellicode.modify.editor.suggestSelection": "automaticallyOverrodeDefaultValue",
  "workbench.iconTheme": "material-icon-theme",
  "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
  "workbench.colorCustomizations": {
    "[Material Theme High Contrast]": {
      "activityBarBadge.background": "#2979FF",
      "activityBar.activeBorder": "#2979FF",
      "list.activeSelectionForeground": "#2979FF",
      "list.inactiveSelectionForeground": "#2979FF",
      "list.highlightForeground": "#2979FF",
      "scrollbarSlider.activeBackground": "#2979FF50",
      "editorSuggestWidget.highlightForeground": "#2979FF",
      "textLink.foreground": "#2979FF",
      "progressBar.background": "#2979FF",
      "pickerGroup.foreground": "#2979FF",
      "tab.activeBorder": "#2979FF",
      "notificationLink.foreground": "#2979FF",
      "editorWidget.resizeBorder": "#2979FF",
      "editorWidget.border": "#2979FF",
      "settings.modifiedItemIndicator": "#2979FF",
      "settings.headerForeground": "#2979FF",
      "panelTitle.activeBorder": "#2979FF",
      "breadcrumb.activeSelectionForeground": "#2979FF",
      "menu.selectionForeground": "#2979FF",
      "menubar.selectionForeground": "#2979FF",
      "editor.findMatchBorder": "#2979FF",
      "selection.background": "#2979FF40",
      "statusBarItem.remoteBackground": "#2979FF"
    }
  },
  "materialTheme.accent": "Blue",
  "synthwave84.disableGlow": true,
  "editor.formatOnType": true,
  "editor.codeLensFontFamily": "CommitMonoChunporo Nerd Font",
  "editor.formatOnSave": true,
  "files.autoSave": "afterDelay",
  "liveServer.settings.donotShowInfoMsg": true,
  "[html]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.html-language-features"
  },
  "[jsonc]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode"
  },
  "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
  "git.openRepositoryInParentFolders": "never",
  "code-runner.runInTerminal": true,
  "terminal.integrated.fontFamily": "monospace",
  "editor.inlineSuggest.suppressSuggestions": true,
  "editor.formatOnPaste": true,
  // "terminal.integrated.enableMultiLinePasteWarning": false,
  "security.workspace.trust.untrustedFiles": "open",
  "liveServer.settings.donotVerifyTags": true,
  "redhat.telemetry.enabled": true,
  "[dart]": {
    "editor.formatOnSave": true,
    "editor.formatOnType": true,
    "editor.rulers": [80],
    "editor.selectionHighlight": false,
    "editor.suggestSelection": "first",
    "editor.tabCompletion": "onlySnippets",
    "editor.wordBasedSuggestions": "off"
  },
  // "[python]": {
  //   "editor.defaultFormatter": "ms-python.black-formatter"
  // },
  "python.formatting.provider": "none",
  "notebook.lineNumbers": "on",
  "cmake.configureOnOpen": true,
  "editor.accessibilitySupport": "off",
  "vscode-pets.petColor": "black",
  "editor.tokenColorCustomizations": {},
  "remote.WSL.fileWatcher.polling": true,
  "github.copilot.enable": {
    "*": true,
    "plaintext": false,
    "markdown": false,
    "scminput": false
  },
  "workbench.editor.empty.hint": "hidden",
  "editor.linkedEditing": true,
  "gitlens.ai.experimental.provider": "openai",
  "gitlens.ai.experimental.openai.model": "gpt-3.5-turbo-1106",
  "git.autofetch": true,
  "svg.preview.mode": "img",
  "dart.flutterSdkPath": "C:\\dev\\flutter",
  "[json]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.json-language-features"
  },
  "python.analysis.fixAll": [],
  "markdown-preview-enhanced.previewTheme": "github-light.css",
  "markdown-preview-enhanced.codeBlockTheme": "auto.css",
  "markdown-preview-enhanced.revealjsTheme": "simple.css",
  "markdown-preview-enhanced.enablePreviewZenMode": false,
  "git.confirmSync": false,
  "workbench.startupEditor": "none",
  "editor.largeFileOptimizations": false,
  "gitlens.launchpad.indicator.enabled": false,
  "emmet.includeLanguages": {
    "django-html": "html",
    "jinja-html": "html"
  },
  "python.createEnvironment.trigger": "off",
  "explorer.confirmPasteNative": false,
  "explorer.confirmDragAndDrop": false,
  "security.promptForRemoteFileProtocolHandling": false,
  "workbench.editorAssociations": {
    "*.pdf": "latex-workshop-pdf-hook",
    "file:/**/*.csv": "jupyter-data-wrangler"
  },
  "latex-workshop.intellisense.bibtexJSON.replace": {},
  "latex-workshop.latex.tools": [
    {
      "name": "pdflatex",
      "command": "pdflatex",
      "args": [
        "-synctex=1",
        "-interaction=nonstopmode",
        "-shell-escape", // <-- Add this line
        "--file-line-error",
        "%DOC%"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "xelatex",
      "command": "xelatex",
      "args": [
        "-synctex=1",
        "-interaction=nonstopmode",
        "-shell-escape", // <-- Add this line
        "%DOC%"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "lualatex",
      "command": "lualatex",
      "args": [
        "-synctex=1",
        "-interaction=nonstopmode",
        "-shell-escape", // <-- Add this line
        "%DOC%"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "biber",
      "command": "biber",
      "args": ["%DOCFILE%"]
    }
  ],
  "latex-workshop.latex.recipes": [
    {
      "name": "pdflatex",
      "tools": ["pdflatex"]
    },
    {
      "name": "xelatex",
      "tools": ["xelatex"]
    },
    {
      "name": "lualatex",
      "tools": ["lualatex"]
    },
    {
      "name": "pdflatex -> biber -> pdflatex*2",
      "tools": ["pdflatex", "biber", "pdflatex", "pdflatex"]
    }
  ],
  "latex-workshop.intellisense.biblatexJSON.replace": {},
  "terminal.integrated.enableMultiLinePasteWarning": false,
  "editor.fontSize": 16,
  "workbench.colorTheme": "GitHub Dark Default",
  "terminal.integrated.enableImages": true,
  "editor.fontWeight": 550,
  "window.menuBarVisibility": "toggle",
  "workbench.sideBar.location": "right"
}"}
